products.dailyMsg: Happy Tuesday! Looks like you left something in your cart!
products.name: Pure Cycles Coaster Bike
products.shortDescription: one speed, no cables, no nonsense
products.longDescription: The Pure Cycles Coaster is biking made simple. 1 speed, no cables, no levers, no nonsense-just you, your bike and the road. It's great for quick errands, slow rolls and late-night party rides.

features.feature: Hands-free coaster brake allows easy, intuitive stoppingâ€”just push back on the pedals to stop
Lightweight steel frame is stronger than aluminum and helps to soften the vibrations of the road; sealed bottom bracket supplies smooth pedaling
Custom-engineered geometry and sweptback bars provide a comfortable, upright ride
Easy-riding single-speed bike is great for quick errands and recreational rides around town
